sentences.english: It was hard for me to change so I just went ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我很難換過來，因此我就將計就計了。

sentences.english: Why not turn to advantage the enemy's plot, since we have known it?
sentences.chinese: 我們已經知道敵人的陰謀，爲何不將計就計呢？

sentences.english: Altai decided tos beat him at his own game, start first for strong, deal with ShaoZheng.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾泰決定將計就計，先下手爲強，對付邵正。
